text: The November Revolution or also called the (Aponte rebellion) was an armed conflict that broke out in Cuba in 1812 against Spain when it was governed by Napoleon. It was the second revolt against the Empire since the Conspirators Rebellion. Jose Aponte Ulabarra, a black carpenter who was part of the Havana Militia was the main leader of the conflict. Category:1812 Category:1810s in North America Category:19th century in Cuba
title: November Revolution
